actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chafee. With written report No. 97-444.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 630.

official_title: An original bill to extend Titles I and II of the Marine Protection, Research and Sanctuaries Act, as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act to authorize appropriations for regulation of ocean dumping for FY 1983.

titles.title: An original bill to extend Titles I and II of the Marine Protection, Research and Sanctuaries Act, as amended.
